MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Forth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.35pm. Our engineers have arrived at Learig substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:44PM on Thursday 31 December 2020.
